effects: Increase ATK by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase DEF by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase MAG by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase SPR by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
name: Raw Feelings
Raw Feelings
活著的感覺
삶의 실감

desc_short: Boost ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR when HP drops below a certain level
HP降低到一定數值以下時提高攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值
HP가 일정량 이하일 때 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY lorsque les PV descendent en dessous d'un certain seuil
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch bei geringen LP
Aumenta ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP cuando la VIT baja a cierto punto
desc_long: Boosts ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR when HP drops below a certain level.
HP降低到一定數值以下時提高攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
HP가 일정량 이하일 때 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 상승합니다.
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY lorsque les PV descendent en dessous d'un certain seuil.
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch bei geringen LP.
Aumenta el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP cuando la VIT baja a cierto punto.
